buginformation.summary: Misleading documentation of page parameter resolved by PageableArgumentResolver Incorrect deprecation message in PageableArgumentResolver
buginformation.description: PageableArgumentResolver is not resolving page parameter. To use pagination, you will have to use page.page So either table 1.1. needs an update or PageableArgumentResolver has to be changed to use the documented parameter PageableArgumentResolver is deprecated in 1.6.RC1 to favor PageableWebHandlerArgumentResolver. However the class PageableWebHandlerArgumentResolver does not exist. I believe the new class to be used now should be PageableHandlerMethodArgumentResolver i.e. without Web after Pageable.
